strapiPost.title: Inn at Carnall Hall Hosts Exclusive Autograph Signing Event with KJ Jefferson
strapiPost.topic: Sponsored by Inn at Carnall Hall
strapiPost.content:
The Inn at Carnall Hall is a proud supporter of the University of Arkansas Athletics and recently announced an exciting Student Athlete Partnership with Quarterback KJ Jefferson.

Home on the Hill: Resting on the lawn of Old Main, The Inn at Carnall Hall's special connection with the University of Arkansas creates an inviting and supportive atmosphere for visiting teams, parents, alumni, and all who gather to celebrate school spirit.

Meet the Quarterback: Don’t miss an exclusive Autograph Signing Event with star quarterback KJ Jefferson at the Inn at Carnall Hall this week! Stop by Lambeth Lounge tomorrow, Aug 24, from 6-7p for complimentary bites and to get your favorite Arkansas gear signed!

Find more information about The Inn at Carnall Hall’s partnership with KJ Jefferson and upcoming events HERE.
